Title: Provides for disclosure of certain law enforcement agency records
Summary: Provides for the disclosure of unredacted law enforcement agency records to a member of a civilian complaint review board that is responsible for investigating police misconduct where such records relate to an officer who was involved in a police shooting or police misconduct.
LawCode: Amd ยง89, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to disclosure of certain law enforcement agency records
